question: Article 72 of the Constitution prescribes that the total number of Ministers, including the Prime Minister, in the Council of Ministers shall not:
option1: exceed 15 percent of the number of members of House of the People
option2: be less than 15 percent of the number of members of House of People
option3: exceed 15 percent of the total members of both Houses of Parliament
option4: be more than one-tenth of the elected members of the House of People
answer: exceed 15 percent of the number of members of House of the People
explanation: First option is the correct answer
